description: This file defines a reducer function and an initial state for managing notes within a React application's state management setup, likely using useReducer hook.

methods.name: notesReducer(state, action)
methods.description: A reducer function handling various actions to manipulate notes state, including setting loading/error states, adding, updating, removing notes, and setting query.
